questions.quote: One second... Well, if it would make you feel better I could speak to Dr. Whatley. I have to go back and have a wisdom teeth removed.
I wouldn't want to get lost in here. It smells like a toilet. People are such animals.
Don't give me "Ma". It's a good thing I didn't hit the table. I could of cracked my head open.
She does a lot of abstract stuff. In fact she's painting Kramer right now.
Oh, *please*! Me? C'mon! That's *great*! Are you kidding? I think thats fan*tastic*! I've always encouraged experimentation! I'm the first guy in the pool! Who do you think you're talking to?
Okay. Hey, you know what, maybe I should give it to my therapist to read. She's smart, I trust her.
Kramer, this is perfect. I need you to go in there, pretend you're a doctor and check this guy for moles.
Jerry, it was so nice of you to come down here on your father's birthday. You've helped take his mind off the condo elections.
You know, like all the comedians always say, 'How would you like it if I came to where you work and heckled you?'
Did I tell you that story's relatable?! That was a great show! That is why I'm bringing it back to NBC.
